node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `achievement` ( `achievement_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` text NOT NULL, `display` text NOT NULL, `achievement_type` char(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `achievement_still_available` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `subtype` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`achievement_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2010056 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: achievement
